articles.title: Coronavirus has been ‘freewheeling’ in California since December, says government official - RT
articles.description: Though California recorded its first case of coronavirus in late January, one Santa Clara physician and government leader says that the virus was likely “freewheeling” through the Sunshine State months before anyone took notice.

articles.title: Hope rises for Turkey hospital as 93-year-old patient recovers from coronavirus - Geo News
articles.description: Her recovery from the disease offered some hope to health workers at Istanbul's Cerrahpasa Medical Faculty
articles.content:

articles.title: What are long term coronavirus effects? - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Some patients who have recovered from coronavirus infection are suffering lasting damage, including liver damage, heart damage and blood clotting problems.
articles.content:

Now doctors are beginning to worry that for patients who have survived COVID-19, the same may be true.

articles.title: Coronavirus found in air samples up to 4 metres from patients: Study - NewsIn.Asia
articles.description: Washington, April 11 (AFP) - A new study examining air samples from hospital wards with Covid-19 patients has found the virus can travel up to 4m - twice the distance current guidelines say people should leave between themselves in public.
